alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone; Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:57AM MDT until April 06 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has cancelled the Lake Wind Advisory. A High Wind Warning is in effect until 4 am Wednesday morning. * WINDS...West 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * TIMING...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...A mix of rain and snow is expected at times today along and north of Highway 2 and across the entire region tonight. Anytime that snow occurs, visibility will be significantly reduced.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
